parts.name: Part A
parts.title: Individual Applicants
parts.description: Individual applicants and married applicants with a non-applicant spouse will complete Items 1 through 16. Items 11, 14 and 15 are voluntary. *Race, ethnicity, and gender information is requested by the Federal Government to monitor FSA's compliance with Federal laws prohibiting discrimination against applicants. Applicants are not required to furnish this information but are encouraged to do so. Failure to provide this information may result in not receiving targeted funds for which the applicant may be eligible. This information will not be used to evaluate this application.

items.name: Exact Full Legal Name
items.comment: List the applicant's full legal name.  The full legal name means an individual's first name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or a nickname.

items.name: Email Address
items.comment: Enter the applicant's e-mail address.

items.name: Mailing Address
items.comment: List the applicants mailing address location.  This will include the name of the registered street, the town/city and state (Including Zip Code).

items.name: Physical Address
items.comment: List the applicants mailing address location.  This will include the name of the registered street, the town/city and state (If different than mailing address).

items.name: County of Residence
items.comment: Enter the county where the applicant's residence is located.

items.name: Contact Telephone Numbers:
items.comment: Enter the applicant's home (landline), cell and/or business telephone number, as applicable.  Indicate applicant's best contact telephone number by selecting “Primary” in the applicable box (Including Area Code).

parts.name: Part B
parts.title: Marries parties applying jointly
parts.description: Married couples (not legal entity) who are joint operators of the operation, are applying jointly, and who have not formed a legal entity will complete the sections. Items 7, 10 and 11 are voluntary. The other spouse will complete Items 13 through 23; Items 19, 22 and 23 are voluntary. Items 25 through 28 pertain to both applicants jointly.

items.name: Exact Full Legal Name
items.comment: List the applicant's full legal name.  The full legal name means an individual's first name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or a nickname.

items.name: Email Address
items.comment: Enter the applicant's e-mail address.

items.name: Social Security Number
items.comment: Nine (9) digits preferably in XXX-XX-XXXX format.

items.name: Date of Birth
items.comment: Applicants date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY formart

items.name: Contact Telephone Numbers:
items.comment: Enter the applicant's home (landline), cell and/or business telephone number, as applicable.  Indicate applicant's best contact telephone number by selecting “Primary” in the applicable box (Including Area Code).

items.name: Full Entity or Trust Name
items.comment: Please use the full legal Entity name from the Entity certificate. The entity name is the legal name of your business. Information must match Farm Programs. (CCC902). The operating entity must be authorized to operate a farm in the state (or states) in which the farm is located. The Entity or Trust name must match the FSA Farm Program Records.

parts.name: Part D
parts.title: General Information
parts.description: An entity is a corporation, formal, joint operation, Limited Liability Corporation, Trust or other legal business organization comprised of 1 or more individuals which may or may not have an entity name or entity tax identification number. Organizations operating as non-profit entities and Estates are not considered eligible entities for Farm Loan Program purposes. Informal entities may leave Items through 8 blank. Items 21, 24 and 25 are voluntary. All other information must be provided on each entity associated with the operation and each individual member of the associated entity. NOTE: Individual liability is required regardless of entity type.

items.name: Counties Being Farmed
items.comment: List counties being farmed and to be farmed. This must match the producer data report from FSA Farm Programs. If you are renting/leasing any farm land, you must have agreements in place for these farms between you and the landowner.

items.name: Business under any other name
items.comment: Check “YES” if you ever conducted business under any other name, otherwise check “NO”.  If “YES” provide the names used in Item 9.

Forms.name: FSA-2002 Three-Year Financial History
Forms.description: A detailed three years financial history. This form is not. Applicant may submit alternate documents that provide the information collected on this form.

items.name: Name
items.comment: Enter the full legal name as an individual. First name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or nicknames.

items.name: Crop Sales
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount for all crop sales in the column for the year in which the crop was sold.

items.name: Livestock & Poultry Sales
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount of sales for all livestock and/or poultry in each of the three years.

items.name: Car and Truck
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount for all crop sales in the column for the year in which the crop was sold.

items.name: Livestock & Poultry Sales
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount of sales for all livestock and/or poultry in each of the three years.

items.name: Owner Withdrawal
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount for all crop sales in the column for the year in which the crop was sold.

items.name: Income Taxes
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount of sales for all livestock and/or poultry in each of the three years.

Forms.name: FSA-2003 Three-Year Production History
Forms.description: A detailed three years production history. This form is not required. Applicant may submit alternate documents that provide the information collected on this form.

items.name: Name
items.comment: Enter the full legal name as an individual. First name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or nicknames.

items.name: Dairy Cows
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount for all crop sales in the column for the year in which the crop was sold.

items.name: Heard numbers
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount of sales for all livestock and/or poultry in each of the three years.

items.name: Live Stock Type
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount for all crop sales in the column for the year in which the crop was sold.

items.name: United Raises
items.comment: Enter the total dollar amount of sales for all livestock and/or poultry in each of the three years.

items.name: Crop & Unit
items.comment: Enter a description for each type of crop and how that unit is marketed (bushels, pounds, etc.) for all raised crops in each of the three years.  Complete a separate section for each type of crop raised including crops that were only raised for a portion of that particular year.

items.name: Total Yield
items.comment: Enter the total yield (bushels, pounds, etc.) for each crop described above, for each of the three years.
